name: Sonic Frenzy 2
description:
The sequel to the hit Scratch game Sonic Frenzy is here, with new levels, badniks, and features!

-Play as Sonic, Tails, or Mighty and use their unique abilities

-Run through seven retro levels and fight the dastardly Hooligans

-Find the hidden Chaos Emeralds in each level

-Turn on mods to add wacky new elements
